Cabinet PM Tablet Application v2.1.0
Built: 2025-12-11

=== INSTALLATION ===

1. Run cabinet-pm-tablet.exe
2. The app will automatically:
   - Create the database on first run
   - Generate a unique device ID
   - Connect to the master MongoDB server

3. Default Login:
   Username: admin
   Password: cabinet123

4. Access the app at: http://localhost:3000

=== UPDATING ===

The app will automatically check for updates on startup.
If an update is available, you'll see a notification.

=== SYNCING DATA ===

1. Go to the "Sync" page in the navigation menu
2. Click "Full Sync" to sync with the master database
3. Your device will maintain a local copy for offline work

=== SUPPORT ===

For issues or questions, contact your IT administrator.

MongoDB Server: mongodb://172.16.10.124:27017/cabinet_pm_db
Version: 2.1.0
